modalities.speech: Gangster Tito Link's arrest led to a raid on Jagasinghpur, where STFs seized a gun, 12 bullets, and cash worth 64,000 rupees from his home and two hotels. The government is now investigating the case and has to take action to uncover the truth and invest money to address the situation.
